title: A 1000 dollar question
content:
Hi everybody!

I don't know if this as been discussed before, but a question crosses my mind quite often: if you have 1000 dollars to start a brand new font collection, in wich typefaces would you spend your money?

I'm waiting for your choices!

Cheers,

Jorge Marcedo

Coimbra | Portugal
author: Marcedo

comments.content:
I might start by looking at Typographica's "Best of" list.

But the better answer might be a question: What would you be using them for?
